The force of the push causes the two to accelerate in the same direction at the same acceleration.
The acceleration of the two is equal to 825 N / (60 kg + 25 kg) = 13.67 m/s^2.
The distance traveled by the two is equal to the distance traveled by the man plus the distance traveled by the boy.
The distance traveled by the man is 13.67 m/s^2 * 60 kg = 792 m/s^2.

The total distance traveled by the two is 792 m/s^2 + 341.25 m/s^2 = 1133.25 m/s^2.
The time it takes for the two to travel this distance is 1133.25 m/s^2 / 13.67 m/s^2 = 82.5 seconds.
